import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { RatingModal } from "../../components/shared/RatingModal/RatingModal"; import { useAuthContext } from "../../contexts/AuthContext"; import { getOne } from "../../services/showsService"; import styles from './ShowDetails.module.css'; export const ShowDetails = () => { const { showId, type } = useParams(); const [show, setShow] = useState({}); const { currentUser } = useAuthContext(); const [rateShow, setRateShow] = useState(false); const openRateModal = () => setRateShow(true); const closeRateModal = () => setRateShow(false); useEffect(() => { getOne(showId, type) .then(result => setShow(result.fields)); }, [showId, type]); return ( <> {show.title &&

{show.title}

LMDb Rate

{Object.keys(show.rating.usersRated).length === 0 ?

No rating yet

:

{show.rating.ratingPoints} / 10

({Object.keys(show.rating.usersRated).length})

}

Your Rate

{show.rating.usersRated.hasOwnProperty(currentUser?.uid) ?

{show.rating.usersRated[currentUser?.uid]} / 10

:

Rate

}
    {show.imageList.map((x, i) => { return
    2. })}
    {show.imageList.map((x, i) => { return
  1. Go to slide {i}
    2. })}
